title: Update prompt template to include epic context
description:
Modify the prompt template to inject epic context before task details.

## Requirements
- Add Epic Context section to prompt template
- Only show section if EpicContext is non-empty
- Position before Epic Notes section
- Clear header explaining this is pre-computed context

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] New `{{if .EpicContext}}` section in prompt template
- [ ] Section header: '## Epic Context'
- [ ] Explains context was pre-generated for this epic
- [ ] Context content rendered as-is (markdown passthrough)
- [ ] No section shown when EpicContext is empty

## Template Addition
```
{{if .EpicContext}}
## Epic Context

The following context was generated for this epic. Use it to understand the codebase.

{{.EpicContext}}
{{end}}
```
